text: John Melvin "Deep" Friesz (pronounced "Freeze") (born May 19, 1967) is a former football player, a quarterback in the National Football League for four teams. Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:American football quarterbacks Category:San Diego Chargers players Category:Washington Redskins players Category:Seattle Seahawks players Category:New England Patriots players
title: John Friesz
